name: Cashmere
headline: Crypto wallet for web3 startups
description: Cashmere is a multisig solana wallet for enterprises to manage their digital assets. Instead of running their business from one person’s wallet, startups can use our wallet to securely manage their funds.

founders.name: Shashank Khanna, Founder
founders.description: Shashank is the co-founder and CEO of Cashmere. Before starting Cashmere, he was a software engineer at Amazon and SoFi. Shashank graduated from UCLA where he studied computer science.

generated_description:
Cashmere is a promising startup in the Web3 space, founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's W22 batch. Based in San Francisco, this small but impactful team of three aims to redefine how startups manage their digital assets with a focus on security and collaboration. 

Initially conceived as a multisig wallet for Solana, Cashmere is crafted exclusively for enterprises. The concept here is simple yet revolutionary: rather than relying on a single individual's wallet—which poses risks—startups can use Cashmere's secure multsignature wallet to handle their funds. This not only elevates security through shared control but also facilitates better decision-making among team members.

The mission of Cashmere extends beyond just wallet functionalities; they provide features that cater to a range of users, from corporate teams managing their treasuries to NFT creators and individual investors. They're tackling issues common in the crypto space, such as securing assets and easing transaction processes.

Recently, Cashmere launched a feature allowing users to earn USDC directly from their wallets, reflecting their commitment to constantly evolving and adding value to their service. 

The company’s website—[cashmere.finance](https://cashmere.finance)—serves as a comprehensive hub for features, a roadmap of upcoming functionalities, and resources like documentation and a blog. They also highlight their investor backing, which notably includes Y Combinator and Coinbase Ventures, signaling confidence in their vision.

With tags like 'DeFi', 'Crypto-Web3', and 'DAO', and a future steeped in innovation, Cashmere is clearly positioning itself to be a key player in the growing world of decentralized finance. Their approachable ethos invites teams and individuals alike to explore a more secure way of managing crypto assets, fostering trust and collaboration. In a world where digital asset management can seem elusive, Cashmere is making strides to simplify it—one wallet at a time.
